title: Version 1.7.3:
message:
Version 1.7.3:

- Removed redundant option "Hide the Download button if my system is up to date" from Settings.

title: Version 1.7.2:
message:
Version 1.7.2:

- The install guide has been improved: It is now more clear that there are multiple pages.
- Fixed error "Can't open file": The install guide will now be shown if you tap on the "Download complete" notification.
- Updated various texts in reflection of the shutdown of Cyanogen Inc.

message:
Version 1.7.1 (now good!)
- Fixed a bug that caused some Dutch texts to be displayed in English.

title: Version 1.7.1:
message:
Version 1.7.1:
- Added clickable links and style formatting to update description
- Moved test server URL config to build.gradle
- Fixed download error text being too close to above text in the default install guide.

title: Completed work on next release:

Completed work on next release:
- Bumped version number to 23 (1.7.0)
- Set target Android version to API 23, because i don't have Android 7.0 on any device.

- Added loading bar to update information screen
- Configured better timeouts in ServerConnector
- When download permission is required, the download now directly starts after granting the permission.

title: Improved install guide and improved texts
message:

- Renamed activities and packages to better match model names
- Massively improved help page text.
- Optimized imports
- Removed old unit tests. They were useless.

- Removed hardcoded layouts of install guide
- Fixed gcm registration on new test server
